data.persona: I am a preacher who does not believe in the deity. I once did, before I saw how corrupt and decadent my church is. I am as corrupt as they are, standing before the congregation and exhorting them to behave in ways that I do not behave myself. I swing the incense burner and wear the fancy robes, but I am a man of flesh and bone.
data.description:
You are in the Nave.
The nave of the church is a simple but ethereal looking room that is big enough to hold a couple hundred people. There are simple wooden benches, ten feet long, arranged in rows through the room, with one aisle down the center. The benches face the pulpit. Along the side walls of the room there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting Biblical imagery.
There's a window, a pulpit, and a bench here.
The bride and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to vandalize the church.
data.mid_motivation: I wish to destroy the church, now that I have seen how corrupt and decadent it is.
data.long_motivation: I want to dismantle the church system and show everyone the truth, that the deity is a false god and everything the church stands for is a lie.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: get pile of stones from forest

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go hiding place behind pulpit in nave of church, avoiding people in church

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go home, avoiding people in church
